content: Im running the hapi server through the jar file in the command line (hapi-fhir-cli) interface mentioned in this link https://hapifhir.io/hapi-fhir/docs/tools/hapi_fhir_cli.html the problem is sometime it works and sometimes it does not. Im running this in the linux ubuntu terminal and should I always keep my putty client ON?
sometimes the server opens fine in the :8080 port but sometimes it throws the error as shown below in the screenshot. Im using the command ./hapi-fhir-cli run-server -v r4 command
sometimes it just shows as killed when the server is started
I understand that the killed situation comes when one process keeps running
Im trying to install the hapi FHIR server through docker in the ubuntu 18 using docker-compose up command. Im getting following error Not able to understand the meaning behind it
I have allocated 2GB for java, im still getting the heap space error.
Please discard this thread all the problems mentioned in this thread were fixed and I will soon write a blog addressing all the issues I faced during the installation process
